title.rendered: DeepDrill Solutions Partners with MST LLC in Azerbaijan & Georgia

content.rendered:
DeepDrill Solutions Ltd has appointed MST LLC, Baku, Azerbaijan has its authorised sales, distribution and service provider for the Azerbaijan and Georgia regions.

Following a number of years of successful supply into the region, working with MST LLC on its many projects, both companies are keen to widen their collaborative relationship to further support MST LLC growth strategy and increasing presence in high-pressure equipment sales and service.

MST LLC has long been a trusted partner for the sales and service of DeepDrill Solutions’s range of Standard High Pressure Products as well as Engineered Systems such as Valve testing and Hose Testing systems and is currently developing a new 2 hectares integrated build, service and product stocking facility in the FTZ Sea Trade Port in Baku.

In the picture from left to right: Kamil Baghirov (MST QHSE Manager), Eivaz Mirzoyev (MST General Manager), Findlay Beveridge (DeepDrill Solutions), Hamza Abdullazade (MST Sales Manager).
